name: Flow State - Max Chill Edition
description:
Welcome to your Flow State!
Feel free to stay as long as you want and immerse yourself in a serene, focus-driven environment.

Have you been procrastinating on tackling those daunting tasks? Flow State was designed to assist you in taking the first step. Upon entering the game, enter flow state and get to work! Embrace the soothing ambiance to help you get started on any task you've been avoiding.

Build up your relaxing environment with plants and other desk customizations that will help increase your focus!

Calming Lo-fi Soundtrack

Flow State features fantastic lo-fi tunes from various talented musicians. To enhance the tranquil atmosphere, you can choose to turn the rain sounds on or off. Don't forget to explore more of their creations!

Earn Focus

Earn focus points for keeping Flow State open, earn even more when you're focusing on something!

Up your Focus Game!

Purchase upgrades to your study space with your Focus Points. Add plants and other trinkets to your room to help you concentrate.

Achieving your goals

The only way to stop the timer is by exiting the game. Once you've started an activity, commit to it and begin! Your Flow State journey awaits.
